short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn your browser into your MCAT study buddy that keeps you inspired, focused, and confident.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With every new tab, you will:

✅ Stay grounded with changing wallpapers, sometimes displaying the beauty of nature and sometimes the beauty of your medicine dreams.

✅ Remain confident with a reminder and affirmation of your goal MCAT score

✅ Get motivated with a new quote, showing you just the message you need, when you need it

✅ Keep your momentum going with a running countdown for your upcoming test day

✅ Stay focused with link shortcuts directing you to valuable MCAT prep resources

Have feedback? Need help? Reach out to us:
https://medlifemastery.com/contact
